name: Shell Shatter (itch)
description:
Submitted for the Great Spring Game Jam 2022!

Welcome to Shell Shatter! You are an egg who needs to get into the picnic basket whilst avoiding dangerous things that can crack you open! Make your way through dangerous traps and simple puzzles to be part of a wonderful spring breakfast!

CONTROLS:

Click to pick up the egg.

F for fullscreen

M to return to the menu.

WARNING:

IT IS RECOMMENDED that you play the game in fullscreen or else some game elements will not be visible.
